open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Vumatel Maintenance | Arauna; Bracken Heights & Eden Park
open.description: Vumatel is conducting maintenance in Arauna; Bracken Heights & Eden Park from Sep 16, 2024, 08:00 to Sep 20, 2024, 13:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Octotel outage | Ruyterwacht & surrounding areas
closed.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Ruyterwacht & surrounding areas, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
closed.resolution: Octotel engineers have completed the fibre repair works. All those affected by the break have been restored. Please have those customers still offline reboot their ONT and routers and retest the connection.
